website_summaries.verdict: At $400, Samsung's Galaxy A51 has a gorgeous display, good cameras, and a battery that will easily get you through the day, but it can use a boost in the processor department.

customer_reviews.title: The phone is great but i have concerns
customer_reviews.text: The phone i received came with an already cracked lense as pictured!! Also, i noticed the browser defaulted to a portuguese web address when i first set it up, so i do not think this is a UK version in the slightest. It is still a great phone though and i am glad i purchased it, despite this :(
customer_reviews.author: Michael Foran

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy A51 Dual-SIM 128
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Galaxy A51 Dual-SIM 128 This Mobile Phone is Awesome, I had the Samsung Galaxy A3 and it cannot compete with A51, The A51 is the same size as the Samsung Galaxy S9+ got a little more feature as well. I Recommend this to everyone who is looking for a Decent Mobile Phone at a Reasonable Price.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the new Samsung Galaxy mobile phone one Friday afternoon, it came the very next day. It was fantastic it managed to quickly remove everything of my old phone and transfer it to this phone. I have been delighted with my new phone and can recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David Moreton

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, high quality, a lot less bloatware than usual, fingerprint scanner works really well far better than high end Sony phone. Camera quality is Amazing, quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ian and Lisa Duck

customer_reviews.title: Super phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone easy to use was far cheaper to buy than going into a long contract and easy to pay instalments also super fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: mr a c wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not to purchase from this seller and this phone.
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed as I just purchased this samsung phone for 2 months and paid £290 for it and it just stopped working and the lcd screen doesn’t turn on.I contacted the seller and they are saying return the phone unused for a refund,this is just not right as in this country all mobile phones comes with 12 months warranty👎Do not recommend this seller .
customer_reviews.author: M.Najafi

customer_reviews.title: Software UI and Hardware incredible for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing! I lost my old J7 and bought this as its replacement and it is 100x better for a mid-range phone. The camera quality is great and even the FPS in games is acceptable. Definitely referring another friend or family members to buy the Galaxy A series of phones!
customer_reviews.author: Shohidul Islam

customer_reviews.title: Great storage & good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I really can't praise this phone enough, it does all I want and more, nice sized screen which is handy when I use it for maps when walking, great camera excellent storage, & very good value for money, good battery life as well.
customer_reviews.author: magnus45

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good value
customer_reviews.text: The screen is extremely sharp and gets very bright, amoled screen makes colours pop. The fingerprint sensor underneath the screen works without fault every time and is fast and responsive. The camera is great for the price especially the macro camera if you like taking photos of plants or anything like that. All in all the phone is great value and would highly recommend for those looking for a budget phone (doesn’t preform as though it’s a budget phone nor does it feel that way) great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: a little more truthful
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a UK phone not a European modified
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: No free speaker
customer_reviews.text: This review is not for the phone itself. The advert on amazon showed you could claim a free speaker worth £170, this made it a great deal for me. After buying the iPhone I was told by Samsung I'm not eligible for the free speaker as the phone was not sold buy an authorised seller! Luckily I hadn't opened the phone box so I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W

customer_reviews.title: Samsung sensation
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his birthday and he loves it - he is a Samsung fan
customer_reviews.author: TerrieB

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from Samsung j5. Swift responsive bigger screen. No too heavy
customer_reviews.author: julia white

customer_reviews.title: Great mid range phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for mid range. All you want from a smartphone, battery life, great screen, handles well lots of open apps. No need to buy top range phone if you only need a phone for day to day purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy A51 4G.
customer_reviews.text: It's what I expected also have a Galaxy S8 64gb memory but this is 128gb my first problem was setting up finger print recognition but now I hit power button scan index finger and unlocks straight away. So far phone is great. Only downside it's a 4G not a 5G but at the price I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Dan McGivern

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present. Easy to transfer data over from old phone. Easy to use. Camera is fantastic. Overall recipient was delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: After buying the phone and a case to go with it was extremely upset and dissapointed in how easy my screen smashed. Was sitting out in my daughters patio and the phone slipped out my hand and fell about 18ins and the screen smashed. Have had to go back to my old phone Huawei which I've had at least 3yrs and which has been dropped a few times with no smashed screen
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McConnacher

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: amazing. Arrived on time. Easy set up. Really nice phone. Went from a Samsung j to this. Such an upgrade. The photos are so clear. Well worth your money. Glad I treated myself to this.
customer_reviews.author: phillipa dixon

customer_reviews.title: Everything is so clear and camera brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a great piece of kit and an excellent phone for the price I arrived on time dispatched one day arrived the next easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Like all Samsung products, excellent. Easy to transport old phone stuff and to program into car. Different to old phone so takes time to find way round it
customer_reviews.author: danglepuss

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, easy to use,battery seems to be lasting 2 days average use. Love this phone
customer_reviews.author: Ant Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: how to use all features
customer_reviews.text: phone works well. one very big problem, ear phones do not work, loose in phone socket. used ear phones in other items and work well. phone is at fault with a loose socket this stops me from using all the features of the phone. How can I resolve this problem? Not very pleased as it is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: mr james robert ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Clear images, light and easy to carry. Have purchased a wallet to keep it in as quite slippery and could easily get damaged. Easy to set up and transfer everything from my old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Not too expensive mobile. Beautiful design. Large screen. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: It was for my wife. Loves the camera. Great improvement on the Samsung J6 that she flushed away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Volume decreases
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone but the volume keeps decreasing ad-hoc, which can be annoying, otherwise all ok
customer_reviews.author: Outlander

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. And good phone. However I didn’t get any cashback
customer_reviews.author: Soma

customer_reviews.title: ITS GREAT FOR YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great phone with many features that you would see on flagship phones! recommend it 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Momchil

customer_reviews.title: Mobile phone is great and the carmer
customer_reviews.text: Great phone i bought for my husband for hus 70 birthday
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Photos are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The phone had arrived a day earlier than stated. very quick service. Excellent service
customer_reviews.author: kellymason

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Handles good very responsive, nice size
customer_reviews.author: Paul Richard Sealy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for someone who wants to use social media, take pictures and make calls! Very impressed for price
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as you would expect from Samsung and great retail experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a smart phone
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to set up. I got a friends 13 year old son to sort it out for me. (I'm 88)
customer_reviews.author: Sacco

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and plenty of memory. Excellent quality on screen. Like it a lot and great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Valueseeker

customer_reviews.title: Best budget smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone for this value. Good camera, nice design, sometimes gets some lag but with an update/reboot all good.
customer_reviews.author: Octavian Ciupitu

customer_reviews.title: Worst battery life
customer_reviews.text: It's good mobile as a spec but battery is worst you have to charge twice a day for normal use.
customer_reviews.author: SSaai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what it says awesome screen awesome camera long lasting battery life
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Up to now it's an excellent piece of technology, easy to operate excellent photos/movies large clear screen, and great for streaming and connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Healey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, up to date phone for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Yassin

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Screen scratch we very easily. More than any previous phone I owned. After 3 months it looks like it's 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: nik h

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: very bad with the battery of this phone. very bad .. in 4 hours it ends completely
customer_reviews.author: G. Patricio Bastidas Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great phone really good camera much cheaper than S20
customer_reviews.text: Glass cracked in 3 days but I guess thats due to being dropped
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bowron

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad phone for the price. Great screen, ok camera and processor...
customer_reviews.author: Diogo Costa

customer_reviews.title: Hmm suspect....
customer_reviews.text: I'm wary as to whether this is the real thing. It didn't come with the normal samsung protective filter, just a clear one, plus the security sticker has the wrong version of the samsung logo. Furthermore, all unboxings I've seen have included a case and pre installed screen protector and this didn't. If someone can tell me why this is I'll be happy to up my rating, but at the moment I'm afraid I may have bought a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: GUTTED!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would so love to write a review, and I will 100% WHEN I get my order!!! I got the delivery, so excited, opened the box which didn't have any cellophane around it,, looked inside and found......EVERYTHING, BUT the handset. OMG gutted to say the least! Got straight on the phone to Amazon told them about the, I'm assuming, STOLEN phone and they were so nice, put it through to the fraud dept investigated what and who had happened to my new phone and will be sending me a replacement . Thank GOD! I will however leave a review when I eventually get my phone and see how happy or unhappy I am with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-level phone
customer_reviews.text: No sure what the bad reviews here are about - the phone was direct from Amazon, not from marketplace, and clearly legit and as advertised. The phone itself is good for the price (with the cash back was £270 ). Build isn't as good as my previous phone the A5 2016, but it's fine. Lovely screen though, fast enough, and Samsung phones just work.
customer_reviews.author: Will J Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Samsung J6 phone which I was found was rather slow as it got older and I needed more memory so after doing some research and reading the reviews I decided this one was a good choice. I wasn’t disappointed. Everything downloads much faster, the fingerprint reader is on the front (it was on the back on the J6) home screen so it’s so much easier to manage and I have lots of memory. I transferred the majority of my apps from my old phone to this one which made life easier. Great value for money as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Jan

customer_reviews.title: Impressive camera facilities
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm enjoying my new phone. I'm not a techno person but am getting to grips with it well. Love quality of photos plus doing panoramic views so easily it's worth buying just for that. Not too bulky which is good for handbags.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Edwards

customer_reviews.title: a great price  and all in all a nice phone
customer_reviews.text: the phone is not much or less than the s20 it maybe slower and the camera may not be as good but the phone is very good. The big factor is the price about 700 pound less
customer_reviews.author: Shane Brimfield

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Qualify for Samsung Loudspeaker Promotion
customer_reviews.text: Everything 100% except that this purchase does not qualify for the Samsung free loudspeaker promotion - Amazon merketplace purchases are explicitly excluded by Samsung. Can't blame the seller for this at all, but I didn't realise until after I started using the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Noggin the Nog

customer_reviews.title: Great 'phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really an expert on technology, however, I will say, the 'phoned arrived super fast and it works, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter who loves it! She did her research and this was her first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie K

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: My Husband treated me to a new phone. i like Samsung as they are easy to use. Good size screen and lots of features. Still learning how to use it but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating at times but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not much of an improvement on the a50. Fingerprint reader worked great with apps but unlocking is often problematic. Apart from.that its not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Ww Mcilroy

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: 0This is my fourth Samsung and it compares well. They are reliable and user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: carole mattison

customer_reviews.title: Nice Samsung Galaxy A51 mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new mobile phone Samsung A51, it is more than just a basic phone and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: always had a Samsung I would say this phone has been the best
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars, but the charge only just lasts a day.
customer_reviews.author: c webb

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy A51 Mobile Phone; Sim Free Smartphone - Prism Crush Black (UK version)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Style Name:4G

From holiday memories to nights out, Samsung Galaxy A51 lets you capture the world as you see it. An immersive Super AMOLED Infinity-O Display turns switching between social apps and watching videos into a whole new experience. Everything you see is crisp, clear and rich. Samsung Galaxy A51 comes with a powerful 4,000 mAh battery*, giving you the freedom and convenience to share and stream. Dual SIM capability keeps you connected. Add a second SIM card for dual SIM capability perfect for when you’re travelling. 

*Typical value tested under third-party laboratory condition. Typical value is the estimated average value considering the deviation in battery capacity among the battery samples tested under IEC 61960 standard. Rated (minimum) capacity is 3900mAh for Galaxy A51. Actual battery life may vary depending on network environment, usage patterns and other factors.
feature_bullets: Camera: capture the world as you see it, effortlessly crisp and clear photos with the powerful 48MP Rear Camera and its quad-camera system
Design: designed to stand out and turn heads with an immersive Super AMOLED Infinity-O Display
Battery: Giving you the freedom to go further
Video: you can film super-smooth action, putting professional mobile video at your fingertips
What's in the box: Samsung Galaxy A51 Prism Crush Black smartphone, UK charger, user manual, warranty card tray pin, earphones

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
